files.isobar_field_v4_1.json: Numeric field encoding of isobars over folio index.
files.isobar_map_v4_1.json: Global map of bands, classes, and zones.

isobar_classes.drift_basin: Low continuity and low pressure; diffuse, drifting meaning regions.
isobar_classes.mixed_band: Intermediate or mixed conditions not dominated by a single regime.
isobar_classes.shear_front: Intermediate vorticity with rising storm; semantic shear fronts.
isobar_classes.stable_isobar: High continuity, high / mid-high pressure, low storm; stable meaning plateaus.
isobar_classes.vortex_pocket: High vorticity with strong storm; localized semantic vortices.

meta.description: Legend for semantic_isobars_v4_1.json and related files.

pressure_bands.high: High semantic pressure: dense thematic / motif fields with strong continuity.
pressure_bands.low: Low semantic pressure: sparse motif density and weak theme pressure.
pressure_bands.mid_high: Moderately high semantic pressure: strong themes with good continuity.
pressure_bands.mid_low: Moderately low semantic pressure: shallow but present theme anchoring.

vorticity_bands.calm: Low vorticity: smooth semantic flow with minimal shear.
vorticity_bands.shear: Intermediate vorticity: thematic shear / turning zones.
vorticity_bands.vortex: High vorticity: tightly curved meaning flow (semantic vortices).
